title: NVIDIA RTX 2070 Review - One MESSED UP Launch!
description: NVIDIA's RTX 2070 wants to be a more affordable alternative to the RTX 2080 and RTX 2070.  But at $500+ does its performance stack up to the Geforce GTX 1080 and Geforce GTX 1070 Ti?  In order to find out, we take a look at the NVIDIA RTX 2070 cards from EVGA and ASUS and put them up against popular custom Pascal GPUs.  Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  Cooler Master ML360 RGB:   MSI GTX 1080 Armor:   Gigabyte GTX 1080 ITX:    Gigabyte GTX 1080Ti:    EVGA GTX 1070 SC:   Zotac 1070 Mini:    Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by EVGA and ASUS. This video is sponsored by Cooler Master. As per HWC guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (from Amazon):  Panasonic GH5 -  Panasonic GH4 -  Panasonic G7 -  Canon C100 -  Sony RX100m3 -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #rtx2070review #rtx2070 #hardwarecanucks
